QuestData.Title: Pride of Place
QuestData.Description:
The Mantle of the Primus. It belongs on his statue.
You were the one to recover it, so you will have the honor of returning it to its proper place.
QuestData.LogDescription: Place the Mantle of the Primus.
QuestData.RewardText: We must find the source of Gharmal's stockpiled anima. But for now, let us enjoy our victory.
